title: 23c03 - “Station” defined.
text:
The term “station”, as used in Sec
13(a)(l0), means a telephone transmitting and receiving instrument, and includes
extension telephones, and telephones for which switching service is provided.
html: The term “station”, as used in Sec 13(a)(l0), means a telephone transmitting and receiving instrument, and includes extension telephones, and telephones for which switching service is provided.
